## This website uses cookies

We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media
features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use
of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may
combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve
collected from your use of their services.

Consent Selection

 **Necessary**

**Preferences**

**Statistics**

**Marketing**

Show details

  * Necessary  48

Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like
page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot
function properly without these cookies.

    * Aha!

Cookies are small text files that can be used by websites to make a user's
experience more efficient.  
  
The law states that we can store cookies on your device if they are strictly
necessary for the operation of this site. For all other types of cookies we
need your permission.  
  
This site uses different types of cookies. Some cookies are placed by third
party services that appear on our pages.  
  
You can at any time change or withdraw your consent from the Cookie
Declaration on our website.  
  
Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us and how we process
personal data in our Privacy Policy.  
  
Please state your consent ID and date when you contact us regarding your
consent.  
  

**Do not sell or share my personal information**

# SAP Advanced Data  
Migration and Management

Don’t get burned by using ETL/ Excel to orchestrate your data migration.
Deliver faster, frictionless enterprise data migrations from one trusted cloud
platform. SAP Advanced Data Migration and Management by Syniti reduces data
migration costs by 38% and delivers Boring Go-Lives®, without fail.

Contact Us __Read the IDC Study __

“

## Your Advanced Data Migration tool is awesome! The conversion and rollout
made our lives way easier. We want to use the tool again for other rollouts in
the future."

Sr. IT Leader

HSN

#####

#### SAP = Our largest partner and reseller

SAP resells Syniti software as SAP Advanced Data Migration and Management by
Syniti. It is a cloud-based data migration solution sold on SAP's price list.

#####

#### Faster, more successful data migrations

SAP Advanced Data Migration and Management by Syniti orchestrates and
automates data migration projects throughout the enterprise data lifecycle,
providing customers with a 46% increase in project efficiency.

#####

#### Intelligent Enterprise-ready data, delivered

SAP Advanced Data Migration and Management powers the move to the Intelligent
Enterprise, producing target-ready data at impeccable accuracy.

### Hundreds of organizations have used SAP Advanced Data Migration and
Management by Syniti

Data Sheet

EXECUTE YOUR MOST CRITICAL BUSINESS INITIATIVES WITH CONFIDENCE.

Capabilities

## Frictionless SAP data migrations, without fail

  * SAP Solution Extension
  * Budget predictability
  * Optimized and inherent data quality
  * Faster migration waves 
  * Complete project transparency
  * Accelerated downstream projects 

#### SAP Solution Extension

SAP Advanced Data Migration and Management by Syniti, is an SAP-approved
solution extension, a preferred partner of RISE with SAP, and an SAP solution
of choice for effective data migration.

#### Budget predictability

SAP Advanced Data Migration and Management customers know their SAP data
migration projects will be done right, on-time, and on-budget. Customers
consistently experience a positive ROI in under 12 months.

#### Optimized and inherent data quality

SAP Advanced Data Migration and Management by Syniti dramatically improves
data quality during every data transformation, resulting in a trusted,
centralized data landscape where superior business outcomes can become
reality.

#### Faster migration waves

With a learning platform driven by AI/ML, SAP Advanced Data Migration and
Management by Syniti allows you to reuse mappings, harmonization techniques,
and more–ensuring each successive migration wave becomes easier, faster, and
lower risk.

#### Complete project transparency

SAP Advanced Data Migration and Management by Syniti delivers comprehensive
insight into your data initiative with dashboards that track every aspect of
your project: including timelines, data quality scores, workflows, outcomes,
and more.

#### Accelerated downstream projects

Whether you’re migrating or governing data with SAP Advanced Data Migration
and Management, every decision about data rules, business processes, team
members and roles, mappings, and more is available post go-live in SAP
Advanced Data Migration and Management for your next data initiative–
resulting in future cost savings.

USE CASES

## Address your most important data initiatives.

SAP Advanced Data Migration and Management by Syniti power an extensive range
of challenging data migration projects. Here's just some of the scenarios SAP
Advanced Data Migration and Management helps deliver:

#####

### Mergers and acquisitions

Making an acquisition or divesting a division or product line? Syniti
continues to be the data migration solution of choice for hundreds of billions
of dollars of transactions.

Learn more __

#####

### ERP migration and consolidation

Transitioning to the newest version of your ERP? Looking to consolidate
multiple systems into one? Syniti helps you execute with confidence and
deliver digital-ready data on day one.

Learn more __

#####

### Moving to the Cloud

Migrating your global HR solution to the cloud? Moving your procurement or PLM
solution to a SaaS platform? Our source- and target-agnostic software delivers
every time.

Learn more __

#####

### Move to SAP S/4HANA

Resold by SAP, Syniti provides the only SAP advanced-certified, cloud-based
data migration solution for SAP RISE to S/4HANA (SAP Advanced Data Migration
and Management by Syniti) and delivers intelligent enterprise-ready data,
every time.

Learn more __

#####

### SAP Selective Data Transitions

From software-driven assessment and planning, to optimized data, to automated
custom code refactoring and near-zero downtime, Syniti has your Selective Data
Transition to SAP S/4HANA covered.

Learn more __

#####

### SAP Cloud Migration

Moving your procurement to SAP Ariba? Consolidating your HR on SAP
SuccessFactors? Syniti delivers best-practice accelerators to speed your
projects and exceed expectations.

Migrate to SAP Cloud __
